issue.title: LSF_UNIT_FOR_LIMITS not used for resource requests

content.raw:
Full input of ``lsinfo``:


```
#!bash

jhessel@amc-tesla ~
$ lsinfo 
RESOURCE_NAME   TYPE   ORDER  DESCRIPTION
r15s          Numeric   Inc   15-second CPU run queue length
```
